name: attributeContains
title: Attribute Contains Selector [name*="value"]
desc: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value containing the a given substring.

argument.desc: An attribute value. Can be either an unquoted single word or a quoted string.
argument.name: value

examples.desc: Finds all inputs with a name attribute that contains 'man' and sets the value with some text.

entries.longdesc: This is the most generous of the jQuery attribute selectors that match against a value. It will select an element if the selector's string appears anywhere within the element's attribute value. Compare this selector with the Attribute Contains Word selector (e.g. [attr~="word"]), which is more appropriate in many cases.
